Question: What was the significance of the film 'Swades' in relation to NASA?
Options:
A. It was the first Indian film to be shot inside the NASA headquarters.
B. It was the first Indian film to win an Oscar.
C. It was the first film to feature a NASA astronaut.
D. It was the first Indian film to be banned in the USA.
Answer: It was the first Indian film to be shot inside the NASA headquarters.
